title: Hone to Issho no Isekai Seikatsu - Novel Updates
tags: Adventurers   Beautiful Female Lead   Cheats   Conditional Power   Divine Protection   Elemental Magic   Level System   Magic Beasts   Male Protagonist   Master-Servant Relationship   Necromancer   Poor Protagonist   Poor to Rich   R-15   Romantic Subplot   Slow Growth at Start   Strong to Stronger   Sudden Strength Gain   Sudden Wealth   Summoning Magic   Sword And Magic   Transmigration   Transported into a Game World   Transported to Another World   Underestimated Protagonist   Weak to Strong
author: Hasebe Sasuke   長谷部佐助
description:
MC has been transported to another world, which is the popular MMO he had been playing recently, Freed Online.
Using his in-game knowledge, he spends a year working as a guardsman to acquire the warrior occupation, but due to a stroke of RNG, he was instead given three random support classes he didn’t even want.
Now he continues as an adventurer making use of the skills he now has on him.>
